title: Hal
description: Hal has never known anything beyond her life as a duellist. A stubborn, strong-willed, disinherited aristocrat, she leaves the imperial court at an early age to make her living with her sword. Finally, she seems to have found all she needs in life - that is until she meets Meracad, the daughter of a rich businessman. The two girls are about to find out that true love comes at a price.
author: Kate Cudahy
